Interface InputEventListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
GameController
public interface InputEventListener
Interface for handling input events from the user or game thread. Defines methods for all possible game actions.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    createNewGame()
    Creates a new game, resetting the board and game state.
    int[][]
    getBoardMatrix()
    Gets the current board matrix state.

    Handles a down move event (brick moving down).

    Handles a hard drop event (brick dropping instantly to the bottom).

    Handles a hold event (holding/swapping the current brick).

  • Method Details

    • onDownEvent

      DownData onDownEvent(MoveEvent event)
      Handles a down move event (brick moving down).
      Parameters:
      event - the move event containing type and source information
      Returns:
      DownData containing clear row information and updated view data

    • onLeftEvent

      ViewData onLeftEvent(MoveEvent event)
      Handles a left move event (brick moving left).
      Parameters:
      event - the move event containing type and source information
      Returns:
      ViewData containing updated brick position information

    • onRightEvent

      ViewData onRightEvent(MoveEvent event)
      Handles a right move event (brick moving right).
      Parameters:
      event - the move event containing type and source information
      Returns:
      ViewData containing updated brick position information

    • onRotateEvent

      ViewData onRotateEvent(MoveEvent event)
      Handles a rotate event (brick rotating).
      Parameters:
      event - the move event containing type and source information
      Returns:
      ViewData containing updated brick rotation information

    • onHardDropEvent

      DownData onHardDropEvent(MoveEvent event)
      Handles a hard drop event (brick dropping instantly to the bottom).
      Parameters:
      event - the move event containing type and source information
      Returns:
      DownData containing clear row information and updated view data

    • onHoldEvent

      ViewData onHoldEvent(MoveEvent event)
      Handles a hold event (holding/swapping the current brick).
      Parameters:
      event - the move event containing type and source information
      Returns:
      ViewData containing updated brick information after hold

    • createNewGame

      void createNewGame()
      Creates a new game, resetting the board and game state.

    • getBoardMatrix

      int[][] getBoardMatrix()
      Gets the current board matrix state.
      Returns:
      a 2D array representing the current board state
